column2: Project Role : Application Lead Project Role Description : Lead the effort to design, build and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact.  Must have skills : COBOL Good to have skills : Personal Insurance Minimum  5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Graduation Summary :As an Application Lead, you will be responsible for leading the effort to design, build, and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact. Your typical day will involve working with COBOL and Personal Insurance, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and ensuring timely delivery of projects.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the effort to design, build, and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize project requirements. Ensure timely delivery of projects, adhering to project timelines and budgets. Provide technical guidance and mentorship to team members, ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices. Conduct code reviews and ensure code quality, identifying and addressing any issues or bugs. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Proficiency in COBOL. Good To Have Skills:Experience with Personal Insurance. Strong understanding of software development methodologies and best practices. Experience with project management tools such as JIRA or Trello. Experience with version control tools such as Git or SVN. Solid grasp of database technologies such as SQL or Oracle. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in COBOL. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in software engineering, computer science, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful solutions. This position is based at our Hyderabad office. Qualification Graduation

column2: Looking for a hands-on software development Manager who is passionate about problem solving, people management and software development to develop cutting-edge cloud native software solutions for ERP Cloud.    Oracle, the world leader in Enterprise Cloud, is hiring the best and brightest technologists in the industry as we continue to add customer-centric, world-class, leading edge, secure, hyper-scale-based solutions throughout all levels of the cloud stack. Oracles cloud eco-system is the only complete business cloud platform on the planet, with market leading and business transforming solutions spanning SaaS, DaaS, PaaS and IaaS. Oracles Cloud applications, such as Enterprise Resource Management, Customer Relationship Management, Human Capital Management, and Supply Chain Management are used by thousands of customers across the globe and are the broadest, most innovative in the industry, providing businesses with adaptive intelligence, standardized business processes and competitive advantage at low cost. The team working on Oracle ERP Cloud is looking for passionate, innovative, high caliber, team oriented super stars that seek being a major part of a transformative revolution in the development of modern business cloud based applications. We are seeking highly capable, best in the world engineering managers, developers, architects and technical leaders at the very top of the industry in terms of skills, capabilities and proven delivery; who seek out and implement imaginative and strategic, yet practical, solutions; people who calmly take measured and necessary risks while putting customers first. What you'll do?  ? Responsible for the overall development life cycle of the solution and manage complex projects. ??? Leading one or more Agile scrum teams (as scrum master) to deliver large-scale customer-facing projects on-time with high quality ??? Work closely with senior engineers to develop the best technical design and approach for new product development. Guiding and mentoring developers in day-to-day design and coding tasks ??? Instill best practices for software development and documentation, assure designs meet requirements, and deliver high-quality work on tight schedules. ??? Project management - prioritization , planning of projects and features, Stakeholder management and tracking of commitments ??? Operational Excellence - monitoring & operation of production services ??? Working closely with the Leadership team, Product Managers, Architects, Quality Assurance, User Experience, and other development teams within Oracle to translate business requirements into technical solutions ??? Grow the team by recruiting and hiring top talent ??? Career management, development of direct reports How we work? Modern agile practices and culture ??? Continuous Integration, Delivery, and Deployment ??? Dev+Ops, to deliver operability at scale The ideal candidate has the following profile:  ? BS/MS degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience relevant to functional area. ??? At least 5-7 years of prior management and/or team leadership experience. ??? A high level of energy and initiative, with the ability to lead virtual teams and partner across organizational boundaries to influence development direction ??? Ability to motivate, grow, and guide junior and senior developers ??? Ability to work independently to solve problems and is willing to do what it takes to get things done ??? Experience driving Agile development projects in a fast paced environment.? ??? Ability to develop project plans and schedules to complete complex projects or new product development. ??? Deep hands-on technical expertise in web and cloud technologies - Java server side frameworks, modern JavaScript frameworks/libraries, REST services, XML, SQL, and Oracle Database. ??? Knowledge of professional software engineering practices & best practices for the full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations ??? Solid software development background in cloud native ecosystem - cloud platforms, microservices design and deployment patterns, container technologies, CICD, observability/monitoring, build and configuration tools, multi-tenant architecture etc. ??? Experience with test driven development and unit testing and functional automation using frameworks such as JUnit, Mocha, and Selenium etc. ??? Experience building relationships and influence outside of authority while leveraging Oracle expertise and resources ??? Excellent communication skills (written and spoken) and presentation skills, including explaining technical details as well as escalating blockers

column2: You will take ownership of our DTC ecommerce site, build cool features, drive architecture and implementation strategy enabling Molekule s success.         You will own the team hiring, on-shore/offshore resource definition, hire for key resources inhouse with extended SI partner teams to augment the team for successful execution.         Career Growth: progress and learn, stability, career development/path.         Work Environment: autonomy, ownership, recognition of achievements, life-work balance (see what we did there), challenges.         Culture: transparency of goals and plans, support, collaboration, trust, community, passion, growth mindset.     What you will own:      Manage, mentor and grow the current and growing ecommerce site and development team members.         Maintenance and restructuring of our current platform (Magento) to align with our current DTC business requirements.         Vendor selection and management of future eCommerce platform selection, migration, new launch of B2B site.         Short and long term eCommerce technical roadmap.         Design, architecture, code development and system integrations.         Code reviews for your own team as well as internal and external partners.         Agile development process leading daily standups, sprint plans and business requirement meetings. What you bring to the team:      Advanced degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.         10+ years experience shipping production quality software in a core language (Java, Node, PHP, React, AWS, JavaScript, etc.).         8+ years of experience building and maintaining eCommerce platforms (Magento preferred currently, but experience in other platforms will work).         6+ years of experience managing cross functional development teams.         Agile development experience, able to run and manage Agile delivery, bonus if you have implemented new Agile processes.         Demonstrated cross-functional partnership, influence, leadership and project management. Deep industry knowledge integrating 3rd party platforms; we currently use NetSuite, Oracle, SAP, Avatax and Stripe/payment options, among others.         Agency/contractor partner management experience with onshore and offshore resources.         Comfortable in scrappy startup environments, wearing a lot of hats, and scaling growth. column2: Responsible for the project activities, manages scope, budget and resources to support the development and implementation of software systems meeting the business objectives.      Representing IT, will drive all the systems engineering life-cycle phases, including activities such as planning, designing, documenting, testing, deploying, integrating, communication, reporting, change management and configuration management, ensuring the delivery of the project deliverables on-time, within budget and, with high quality standards        POSITION OBJECTIVES    :    (maximum 1000 characters (not including spaces) for posting on Eurofins website and career portals):              The Engineering Manager bridges the upper management and the execution team by planning, budgeting, monitoring and reporting on the projects to ensure the systems are delivered on time and on budget with expected results. The Engineering Manager is responsible to manage the development and implementation of business applications in a complex environment involving multiple sites internationally.      Provides strategic consultation, recommendations and manages the entire project life-cycle phases, including activities such as planning, designing, documenting, testing, deploying, integrating, communication, reporting, change management, incident management, and configuration management.      Defines priorities, elaborates roadmaps, and ensures that project deliverables are in line with the business requirements, delivered on schedule, and meeting the quality standards defined.      Guides, supervises and enforces technical architecture principles, designs, quality requirements to ensure scalable, maintainable, extendible, reusable, reliable systems development with adequate speed      Establishes and implements engineering best practices, tooling, integrations in the project      Measures and tracks continuous improvements in engineering practice compliance and KPIs through adequate metrices      Coordinates and facilitates work group discussions involving other Managers, Business Analysts, Functional Analysts, Solution Architects and Subject Matter Experts to elicit and document business and user requirements, perform gap analysis, define and reengineer processes based on internal and industry best-practices.      Manages team(s) and the project(s) activities daily, tracks progress, and ensures activities are performed as expected, promoting clear ownership for project tasks and contributing to remove any impediments across the project(s).      Hires, coaches, and develops staff to form objective, engaged and efficient engineering teams. Measures performance, develops improvement plans, and implement solutions to drive continuous improvement of project(s) activities and resources. Sets clear expectations to inspire and motivate the team.      Reports on the project activities to the relevant stakeholders.      Identifies, assesses and authors documentation and addresses ways to harmonize and improve current processes/systems, as well as introducing new ones.      Ensures project activities aligns with Eurofins policies, procedures and methodologies.      Demonstrates and promotes the company vision.      Owns the accountability and responsibility of delivering to client needs and timeliness.      Provides cross-functional support to other departments as required.      Contributes to evolution of organizational standards in terms of technology adoption, control and harmonization          QUALIFICATIONS AND EXPERIENCE REQUIRED:      (maximum 500 characters (not including spaces) for short position posting    and    for posting on Eurofins website and career portals)          Bachelors or above in Computer Science or related degree      Minimum 13 years of experience with software engineering and implementation, including business process design and improvement      Solid expertise of software development process, including requirement gathering, analysis/design, development tools/technologies, release/version control, contemporary testing methodologies, deployment management and support      Strong experience in functionally planning, road mapping and managing a product lifecycle for complex software products      At least 4 years of people management experience; has built and operated teams of highly skilled engineers; Experience with hiring, mentoring, upskilling and performance management      Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with strong practical experience in development project management      Excellent verbal/written communication skill as well as fluency in English      Ability to quickly learn new concepts and software      Experience managing projects in regulated environment with strong process compliance requirement      Self-motivated, independent, detail-oriented, responsible Team player with hands-on mentality          (Additional info not within the character limitation requirements:)            Technology            Full stack experience in Microsoft stack      Strong understanding of systems engineering designs, processes and practices      Angular knowledge preferred      AWS/Azure experience is a plus      Usage of Azure DevOps      Microservices Architecture            Methodology            AGILE Development (Scrum)      PMI/PRINCE2 or equivalent project management experience.      PMP is highly encouraged            Tarvel          Open to travels (30%-40%) across US, Europe and Asia Pacific          Personal skills            Problem Solver: Is creative in finding solutions for ambiguous problems      High Aptitude: Ability to grasp complex concepts and simplify them; ability to connect the dots between disparate knowledge items; keeps updated with evolving technologies and tools      Confident: not afraid of taking responsibility to drive initiatives from start to finish, is capable of making decisions, is capable of working independently, takes ownership of initiatives, build credibility and buy-in from stakeholders      Relationship builder: Connects with people, builds relationships and creates a strong network      Good communicator: Is capable of articulating thoughts in structured manner, is capable of communicating at different levels of the organization, very good interpersonal relation skills at all levels of the organization, with capability to influence decisions and lead others to achieve results      Team builder: Is able to build, motivate and mobilize team(s) to meet objectives.      Self-organized: Experience with team management and leadership that span multiple time-zones and different cultures; Ability to multitask with organization and manage time effectively      Detailed oriented: Details oriented, analytical and investigation skills; Capacity to conceptualize creative solutions, as well as documenting them and presenting/selling them to all levels of the organization, including senior management      Startup Mindset: Dealing with ambiguity, leading through example, responsive to sense of urgency and frugal/business value mindset      Eager to learn: Entrepreneurial thinking and flexibility to change; Demonstrates a positive attitude, capacity for team environment, and exhibits a genuine interest in drug discovery in support of advancing human health.            Preferred attributes            Exposure to Laboratory environment; Experience in scientific/healthcare domain is big plus      Understanding of compliance frameworks such as GxP, HIPAA      Managing experience cross geographies

column2: Benovymed - Software Engineering Manager - Global Digital Health Startup 1) Job Position : Software Engineering Manager - Digital Health Global Tech Startup. 2) Joining : Immediately. 3) Job Location : Delhi NCR, India at our Benovymed Global HQ : Delhi NCR, India. Benovymed Global Technology Development & Innovation Center and Benovymed Global R and D, and AI Health Innovation Center in Gurgaon ( Delhi NCR), India. 4) Job Description : Responsibility and Role : A) Mandatory Role and Responsibility : If you match the criteria below then only you apply. - You should be strong and capable enough as a doer end-to-end Hands-on with skillsets as a Strong Full Stack Software Developer ( Backend Development and with Frontend Development), also a Technology Architect and Software Engineering Manager in a Cloud Technology Environment of AWS, GCP. - As a Multihat role Hero, You should be a Technology builder and doer, you should be in a position to do the Product Software Engineering development for developing a Highly scalable SaaS Cloud Platform for B2B, B2B2C, and B2C direct Consumer Cloud Digital Health Platform for web and Mobile Application right from its Technology Architect, Product Design and Product development, deploy with all functionality as required by the Business owner and Product owner ( Our Products end to end Mobile App Prototype developments already done and the product full step by step functionality is ready for demo and its full functionality working ) to final product delivery for its Commercialisation. - You should be highly accountable, highly responsive, and responsible in understanding the requirement and delivery, and commitment brought to the table within the set tight deadlines. - You should have Hands-on with the latest Proven Technology Stacks on any E-commerce developing Digital Platforms such as in FinTech, AgriTech, Edutech, or in Digital Health and AI Health Platform building after Mobile App Prototypes to delivery on web and mobile applications. - Their primary responsibilities include Tech Architect for building a highly scalable SaaS Cloud Platform for B2B & B2B2C consumers, E-commerce Portal, developing AWS Cloud servers and databases for AI Health based Products and solutions delivered through web and mobile app functionality, and coding for mobile platforms. - Developing front-end web e-commerce Portal architecture. - Designing user interactions on web pages. - Developing back-end website applications. - Creating servers and databases for functionality. - Ensuring cross-platform optimization for mobile phones. - Ensuring responsiveness of applications. - Working alongside graphic designers for web design features. - Seeing through a project from conception to finished product. - Designing and developing APIs, integrating with 3rd Party API for smooth Transaction and working. - Meeting both technical and consumer needs. - Staying abreast of developments in web applications and programming languages. B) Most Important : Your Personality Profile : - You should have a demonstrated track record as a Top Software developer - Performers in delivering your side with strong commitment and your side deliverables as a single-handed hands-on multi-hat role, doer - A good Team Player - Team Leader with good understanding level with your Higher up and Juniors within small Founding Team organizational with Good Behavioural Practice, Caring, Giving Respect and Good Relationship skills, well smoothly connected through with the Team and Reporting Officer with High level of engagement, Integrity, Deep Understanding and Professional Soft and Good Communication Skills is must. 4) Experience : - IT service & MNC IT industry experience candidates need not apply. - Only Early-stage to Growth stage Tech Startup single-handed multi hat role  - Profile experiences Candidates need to apply. - We will only count your Tech Startup IT Product Development Full Stack development Experience for your selection and CTC Package workout. A) Total Experience of 10 to 12 Years of experience in Software Product Development Engineering & Product Development hands-on Multi Hat Role as a doer first in web and Mobile applications only in Tech Startups Preferably in Digital Health, AI Health, or any other industry in a Highly Scalable E-commerce Platform building using Latest Trend in Cloud-based Software Product Technology Preferably: 1 Year as Startup CTO / VP /AVP/ Chief Architect / Engineering Manager -Software Engineering & IT Product Development with a single-handed Multihat role hardcore Engineering Management. Mandatory : - Startup experience as a doer with at least - 2 years as Software Technology Architect, 1 Year as Solutions Architect. - 2 to 7 Years as end-to-end single-handed Multihat role Full-stack Developer ( Backend) mandatory. - Worked from scratch on New Cloud Platform Product development. - 1 Year in DevOps Development Leading managing as optional. - At least 1 year as a Software Engineering Head / Engineering Manager/ Full Stack Developer Lead in web and Mobile application Product Engineering in an early-stage to Growth stage Digital Health Startup from scratch to complete delivery of world-class products and solutions. - Worked as a single-handed independently and as a Team leads with the multi-hat role and in the team as a Backend developer, experienced in QA Testing on web and mobile app in a startup company. - Strong organizational and Software Product engineering project management skills and not in IT Services. 5) Required Job Skillset : - Proficiency with fundamental front-end languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. - Familiarity with JavaScript frameworks such as Angular JS, React, and Amber. - Django, Dynamo DB, LAMP, MEAN stack - AWS ( AWS S3, EC2, Amazon Device Farm), Android, Kotlin, React, react-native - Flutter, dart ios, Swift. - Should have additional skills in NoSQL DB, and MongoDB but it is not mandatory. - Proficiency with server-side languages such as Python, Ruby, Java, PHP, and .Net. Tensor flow. - Familiarity with database technology such as MySQL, Oracle, and MongoDB. Testing Tools : - Appium, Selenium, Robotium, Mockito. Espresso- Excellent verbal communication skills. - Completed product engineering for a highly scalable Digital Health Platform / E-commerce Platform maintaining a high level of Data Security, Data Privacy, and High-level Cybersecurity system implementation with at least 10-30 Mobile apps ( multifunction apps). - Hands-on development from scratch for a highly scalable digital Health / Digital Technology E-commerce Cloud Platform with at least 100 to 50 Million Downloads of his Product developed. 6) Qualification : - B.Tech in CSE / IT / ECE from any reputed engineering Institute. - MBA need not apply.

column2: Experience Level: 7-18 Years               Education:    Bachelor s or Master s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.             Responsibilities:       As an experienced member, you will be a crucial part of our development team, specializing in ASIL-D compliant software development contributing to the advancement of our cutting-edge projects in the automotive and Software Defined Vehicle (SDV) industry. We are seeking a skilled Software Developer to contribute to critical phases of the development life cycle, including software requirement analysis, architecture design, implementation, and testing to make sure ASIL-D compliances are met.     As an ASIL-D Compliance Software Developer, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring the safety and reliability of our automotive software. The ideal candidate will have expertise in both C++ and C, with a focus on ASIL-D coding standards.             Key Responsibilities:           Software Requirement Analysis:       Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze and define ASIL-D software requirements.     Ensure compliance with safety standards and assess potential risks in the software development process.           Architecture Design:       Develop and design robust software architectures that adhere to ASIL-D requirements.     Implement safety mechanisms and redundancy strategies for critical components.           Implementation:       Write clean, efficient, and ASIL-D compliant code in C and C++.     Apply industry best practices to enhance software safety and reliability.           Testing:       Develop and execute test plans to verify ASIL-D compliance.     Conduct unit testing, integration testing, and support validation activities.           Documentation:       Create comprehensive documentation for software designs, implementations, and testing procedures.     Ensure that documentation aligns with ASIL-D certification requirements.           Cross-Functional Collaboration:       Work closely with system engineers, safety engineers, and quality assurance teams to achieve ASIL-D objectives.     Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and adherence to coding standards.                 Qualifications:         Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.     Proven experience in ASIL-D compliant software development for automotive applications.     Proficiency in both C++ and C programming languages.             Skills and Competencies:         Strong understanding of ASIL-D standards, including ISO 26262.     Experience in software requirement analysis and architecture design for safety-critical systems.     Knowledge of safety mechanisms, fault tolerance, and redundancy strategies.     Familiarity with automotive software development processes and tools.             Preferred Experience:         Previous work on ASIL-D compliant projects in the automotive domain.     Knowledge of AUTOSAR architecture and software components.     Familiarity with MISRA C/C++ coding guidelines.

It is a global software technology system incubator with synergetic blend of IT Services and SaaS products under its portfolio. Since 2017, KL has grown organically (180+ employees and expanding) and served 200+ Customers. At the core, KL is a people's company. We serve clients by practicing an employee-centric culture and creating an environment where ideas, creativity, free-flowing communication and innovation is encouraged to create better products and services. Job Description: A technical Specialist to spearhead our team of experts and tech enthusiasts, driving the creation of cutting-edge solutions. Your profound expertise across design, analytics, development, coding, testing, and application programming will elevate team performance, ensuring alignment with standards and meeting business and functional needs. You'll provide strategic direction and tackle intricate, mission-critical challenges both internally and externally. Responsibilities: Lead a development team through all stages of system development and implementation, encompassing analysis, design, development, testing, and ongoing support across diverse and complex development platforms. Take ownership of technical change management, source code, and technical documentation, adhering to best practices. Document, test, and provide continuous support for applications using industry-standard code analysis tools. Master existing systems, applications, and product architectures, identifying opportunities for short and long-term enhancements. Coordinate product development from inception to distribution, overseeing concept art, finalization, and release. Offer architecture guidance with a focus on solution architecture, performance, scaling, and security to deliver scalable, flexible, robust, and efficient applications. Drive technical design solutions, select appropriate frameworks, and apply design patterns consistently. Guide and supervise developers throughout product design, planning, development, implementation, and testing phases. Conduct team meetings, including scrum ceremonies, to review schedules and milestones. Create and manage project plans for large foundation projects, proactively managing changes in scope and devising contingency plans. Requirements/Skills:  Understanding of Project life cycle activities on development and maintenance projects  Excellent knowledge of HTML 5, CSS, Java Script  Experience with of WCF, Restful Web Services, Web API  Experience with ASP.NET MVC 5.0 or later, MVVM  Solid knowledge with relational databases (MSSQL, MySQL); Exposure to cloud computing, distributed computing, and microservices architecture. Strong analytical skills with the ability to understand business problems, structure solutions, and communicate effectively with stakeholders. Familiarity with ORM, including Entity Framework, and latest web UI technologies. Experience in n-tier environment and MVC-based frameworks. Versed in Agile methodology and high-volume web application environments. Education and Experience:  Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field required. Benefits  Life @KL Work on pioneering technology that has real-world impact, from urban planning to disaster response. Be part of a creative, innovative team that values diversity of thought and expertise. Enjoy a flexible working environment that encourages in-person collaboration while supporting remote work when necessary. Benefit from a culture that supports growth, learning, and personal development Lead from the front: We're constantly pushing the envelope to redefine what's possible. We make huge breakthroughs, rapidly advancing our technology and the industry as a whole. It's what we do. Make an impact: We hire rockstars who are passionate about creating the future of spatial computing and want nothing more than to have a meaningful impact on turning our vision into reality. Break down barriers: Our products are designed to dissolve barriers between humans and creating technology that serves all of humanity. No matter where you're based, or which team you work on, youll be part of a group of people working together to build solutions to mission-critical problems and a company that values the very best ideas. Ready to make a difference? Apply now and help us build the future of planetary-scale digital twin technology. Visit us:  https://kadellabs.com/  https://in.linkedin.com/company/kadel-labs
column11: ASP.Net, Web Api, MVVM, Cloud Services, MySQL, Mssql Queries, Javascript, Entity Framework, HTML, MVC, ORM, Microservices

column2: Benovymed - Software Engineering Manager - Global Digital Health Startup 1) Job Position : Software Engineering Manager - Digital Health Global Tech Startup. 2) Joining : Immediately. 3) Job Location : Delhi NCR, India at our Benovymed Global HQ : Delhi NCR, India. Benovymed Global Technology Development & Innovation Center and Benovymed Global R and D, and AI Health Innovation Center in Gurgaon ( Delhi NCR), India. 4) Job Description : Responsibility and Role : A) Mandatory Role and Responsibility : If you match the criteria below then only you apply. - You should be strong and capable enough as a doer end-to-end Hands-on with skillsets as a Strong Full Stack Software Developer ( Backend Development and with Frontend Development), also a Technology Architect and Software Engineering Manager in a Cloud Technology Environment of AWS, GCP. - As a Multihat role Hero, You should be a Technology builder and doer, you should be in a position to do the Product Software Engineering development for developing a Highly scalable SaaS Cloud Platform for B2B, B2B2C, and B2C direct Consumer Cloud Digital Health Platform for web and Mobile Application right from its Technology Architect, Product Design and Product development, deploy with all functionality as required by the Business owner and Product owner ( Our Products end to end Mobile App Prototype developments already done and the product full step by step functionality is ready for demo and its full functionality working ) to final product delivery for its Commercialisation. - You should be highly accountable, highly responsive, and responsible in understanding the requirement and delivery, and commitment brought to the table within the set tight deadlines. - You should have Hands-on with the latest Proven Technology Stacks on any E-commerce developing Digital Platforms such as in FinTech, AgriTech, Edutech, or in Digital Health and AI Health Platform building after Mobile App Prototypes to delivery on web and mobile applications. - Their primary responsibilities include Tech Architect for building a highly scalable SaaS Cloud Platform for B2B & B2B2C consumers, E-commerce Portal, developing AWS Cloud servers and databases for AI Health based Products and solutions delivered through web and mobile app functionality, and coding for mobile platforms. - Developing front-end web e-commerce Portal architecture. - Designing user interactions on web pages. - Developing back-end website applications. - Creating servers and databases for functionality. - Ensuring cross-platform optimization for mobile phones. - Ensuring responsiveness of applications. - Working alongside graphic designers for web design features. - Seeing through a project from conception to finished product. - Designing and developing APIs, integrating with 3rd Party API for smooth Transaction and working. - Meeting both technical and consumer needs. - Staying abreast of developments in web applications and programming languages. B) Most Important : Your Personality Profile : - You should have a demonstrated track record as a Top Software developer - Performers in delivering your side with strong commitment and your side deliverables as a single-handed hands-on multi-hat role, doer - A good Team Player - Team Leader with good understanding level with your Higher up and Juniors within small Founding Team organizational with Good Behavioural Practice, Caring, Giving Respect and Good Relationship skills, well smoothly connected through with the Team and Reporting Officer with High level of engagement, Integrity, Deep Understanding and Professional Soft and Good Communication Skills is must. 4) Experience : - IT service & MNC IT industry experience candidates need not apply. - Only Early-stage to Growth stage Tech Startup single-handed multi hat role - Profile experiences Candidates need to apply. - We will only count your Tech Startup IT Product Development Full Stack development Experience for your selection and CTC Package workout. A) Total Experience of 10 to 12 Years of experience in Software Product Development Engineering & Product Development hands-on Multi Hat Role as a doer first in web and Mobile applications only in Tech Startups Preferably in Digital Health, AI Health, or any other industry in a Highly Scalable E-commerce Platform building using Latest Trend in Cloud-based Software Product Technology Preferably: 1 Year as Startup CTO / VP /AVP/ Chief Architect / Engineering Manager -Software Engineering & IT Product Development with a single-handed Multihat role hardcore Engineering Management. Mandatory : - Startup experience as a doer with at least - 2 years as Software Technology Architect, 1 Year as Solutions Architect. - 2 to 7 Years as end-to-end single-handed Multihat role Full-stack Developer ( Backend) mandatory. - Worked from scratch on New Cloud Platform Product development. - 1 Year in DevOps Development Leading managing as optional. - At least 1 year as a Software Engineering Head / Engineering Manager/ Full Stack Developer Lead in web and Mobile application Product Engineering in an early-stage to Growth stage Digital Health Startup from scratch to complete delivery of world-class products and solutions. - Worked as a single-handed independently and as a Team leads with the multi-hat role and in the team as a Backend developer, experienced in QA Testing on web and mobile app in a startup company. - Strong organizational and Software Product engineering project management skills and not in IT Services. 5) Required Job Skillset : - Proficiency with fundamental front-end languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. - Familiarity with JavaScript frameworks such as Angular JS, React, and Amber. - Django, Dynamo DB, LAMP, MEAN stack - AWS ( AWS S3, EC2, Amazon Device Farm), Android, Kotlin, React, react-native - Flutter, dart ios, Swift. - Should have additional skills in NoSQL DB, and MongoDB but it is not mandatory. - Proficiency with server-side languages such as Python, Ruby, Java, PHP, and .Net. Tensor flow. - Familiarity with database technology such as MySQL, Oracle, and MongoDB. Testing Tools : - Appium, Selenium, Robotium, Mockito. Espresso- Excellent verbal communication skills. - Completed product engineering for a highly scalable Digital Health Platform / E-commerce Platform maintaining a high level of Data Security, Data Privacy, and High-level Cybersecurity system implementation with at least 10-30 Mobile apps ( multifunction apps). - Hands-on development from scratch for a highly scalable digital Health / Digital Technology E-commerce Cloud Platform with at least 100 to 50 Million Downloads of his Product developed. 6) Qualification : - B.Tech in CSE / IT / ECE from any reputed engineering Institute. - MBA need not apply. 7) Our Product and Product Line : - We have a disruptive Innovative Technology Products Line and Novel Solutions delivered through Mobile App / Web on our Cloud Digital Health Platform which is a Game changer, will surpass the current medical Practices, and is driven by Scientific evidence on actionable data-driven in Prevention, early detection, Treatment, Consultation, Clinical decision, Disease management areas of Top5 Chronic Diseases ( Including Top 20 Cancer Diseases|Diabetes|HeartDisease|Mental Health|COPD ) and COVID-19 Pandemic Management Globally to Impact the Lives of Billions of People Globally in a fastest-growing @51.3% CAGR in a few Trillion Dollars AI Health Global Market and Chronic Diseases Global Market. - Our DeepTech Startup was founded on the core R and D which our serial Digital Health Startup Entrepreneur, StartupGuru, and Founder and CEO and Benovymed Chief Global R and D | AI Health Innovation Officer | Chief Business Strategy Officer I Chief Digital Health Officer has developed in over his strong over 28 Years Health Technology experience of Science and Technology driven by ( Digital Health, AI Health, Telemedicine, Big Data, Blockchain, and IoT ) Disruption and Innovation will replace many Big Players Globally from the Market in no time "Just like Smart Phone company demonetized / Replaced the entire Button Phone Companies, Big giants, globally". 8) CTC : - Best Package in Industry depending upon our Unbiased Parametric Selection Procedure Criteria and what you bring to the table with written acceptance and written commitment deliverable within Tight Deadlines. - All Terms and Conditions Apply as per our organization. - To deserving eligible candidates only, the company's attractive ESOP may be given also as a part of a CTC Package for a long-term career Growth opportunity. - Positions & CTC depend upon your candidature and as per our management Terms. - Apply with your CV with passport size photo and current CTC, expected CTC, Notice Period, recent Project details, and cover letter. - This is a high-growth career opportunity that is only best for those who have the capability to fast grow the organization as a High growth driver and with an Entrepreneur Mindset.

column2: TITLE:               Manager, Software Development REPORTS TO:  VP, Software LOCATION:      Remote; Preferably in Pune, India. SUMMARY The Manager, Software Engineering will oversee a team of software engineers responsible for the design, development, enhancement, deployment, and support of one or more Ruffalo Noel Levitz products.   The Manager is responsible for building and leading a highly effective team of software engineers and working cross-functionally to understand and communicate priorities. They are responsible for the professional development of their reports and is the subject matter expert for the product features they are involved in. ESSENTIAL DUTIES/RESPONSIBILITIES: (not limited to) Lead and manage one or more teams responsible for the development and maintenance of RNL technology products. Partner with Product Management to develop product release plans and manage the team's execution of that plan. Maintain an informed view of technical debt and the bug backlog within a technology area and establish priorities for code improvement. Develop processes and tools that ensure delivered software consistently meets high quality standards. Provide technical direction to guide the team in building robust, performant solutions. Work with senior management to establish staffing plans and participate in screening, interviewing, and onboarding new team members. Maintain hands-on technical expertise by making technical contributions to the software design, development and integration of applications and systems. Meet regularly with team members to provide guidance, feedback, and support. Work with team members to build career development plans that ensure continued growth and engagement. QUALIFICATIONS: Education, Licenses/Certifications, Skills, and Work Experience: Bachelor?? degree in engineering, computer science, or a related field required. Minimum of 5 years??experience managing software development teams. Strong people management skills, with the ability to inspire, motivate, and mentor team members. Strong understanding of the software development cycle and experience with Agile delivery. Proven track record of effectively leading teams, managing projects, and driving results. Experience coding/programming/ developing with working knowledge of .Net, Java, or Python programming.  Experience troubleshooting and solving complex and large-scale software problems. Experience working in a product development for a global company. Strong written and communication skills. Willingness to travel as needed (negligible but potentially necessary). Remote/virtual work environment must be free from distractions while performing the essential functions of the job and have a reliable network connection. Position predominantly includes sitting/standing for long periods of time, close vision through the use of a computer screen, extensive keyboarding, talking, hearing, and infrequent light physical effort is required (minimum of fifteen pounds).

column2: The Technical Delivery Manager is responsible for overseeing the successful delivery of technical projects and solutions within an organization     They coordinate with various stakeholders, including clients, project managers, development teams, and other internal departments to ensure the smooth execution of projects     The TDM manages the entire project lifecycle, from requirements gathering to delivery and post-implementation support, while ensuring adherence to quality standards, timelines, and budget constraints       Responsibilities:       Project Management: Plan, execute, and monitor the progress of technical projects, ensuring they are delivered within scope, budget, and schedule     Team Management: Lead and manage a team of technical professionals, including developers, engineers, and other project resources     Assign tasks, set goals, and provide guidance and support to team members     Stakeholder Management: Collaborate with clients, internal departments, and other stakeholders to gather project requirements, define objectives, and manage expectations     Regularly communicate project updates, risks, and issues to stakeholders     Resource Allocation: Determine resource requirements, allocate and manage resources effectively to ensure project deliverables are met     Optimize resource utilization and resolve any resource conflicts or bottlenecks     Risk and Issue Management: Identify project risks and issues, develop mitigation strategies, and proactively address challenges to minimize their impact on project success     Quality Assurance: Ensure project deliverables meet the defined quality standards and adhere to best practices     Implement quality control processes and perform regular reviews and audits to identify and rectify any issues     Change Management: Assess the impact of changes requested during the project lifecycle, evaluate their feasibility, and manage change requests effectively     Coordinate with stakeholders to communicate and implement approved changes     Performance Monitoring: Track project progress, monitor key performance indicators (KPIs), and generate reports to provide visibility to stakeholders     Identify areas of improvement and implement corrective actions as needed     Continuous Improvement: Stay updated with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices related to project management and technical delivery     Drive process improvements and contribute to organizational knowledge management     Customer Satisfaction: Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction by delivering projects that meet or exceed client expectations     Foster long-term relationships with clients and identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling services       Requirements:       Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (eg, Computer Science, Information Technology) is typically required     A master's degree is a plus     Proven experience (typically 5+ years) in technical project management, software development, or related roles     Strong leadership and team management skills with the ability to motivate and guide cross-functional teams     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate with stakeholders at all levels     Solid understanding of project management methodologies and tools     Familiarity with software development lifecycle (SDLC) and agile methodologies     Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities     Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple projects simultaneously     Knowledge of relevant technologies and industry trends     Relevant certifications (eg, PMP, Agile, ITIL) are desirable but not mandatory
column11: PMP, Change management, Manager Quality Assurance, Team management, Project management, Agile, Manager Quality Control, Information technology, SDLC

column2: This position is for a leader who can design and develop solutions for safety critical systems as per state-of-the-art technologies.     Capable of managing multiple software/system projects.     Strong debugging skills.     Hands-on in an avionics/robotics software solutions or system software is desired.     Develop high-quality, secure, scalable software solutions.     Assist team members in the development of applications, components, system-to-system interfaces, and complete software solutions.     Collaborate with cross-functional teams to determine functional and non-functional requirements for new software or applications.     Collaborate with SMEs, domain experts, quality assurance, and end users to produce cutting-edge robust software/system solutions.     Design and documentation of evolving architecture in terms of UML diagrams, architectural diagrams, state machines, flow charts, etc.     Coding, debugging, unit testing, and integration testing.     Work with the project team to meet scheduled due dates, while maintaining the software quality.     Maintain thorough documentation of software artifacts as per software development guidelines for moderately complex projects.     Organize, schedule, and govern team meetings.     Identify project scope, risks, constraints, dependencies, assumptions, and deadlines.      Keep track of the project costs.     Provide timely updates on the project to all concerned stakeholders.     Monitor project progress and perform change management as required.     Perform competency development, Knowledge management.     Obtain weekly project status from all team members and showcase project KPIs.         SKILLS         Hands-on in C++, C#, Network protocols like TCP/UDP, design patterns, and principles.     Minimum 10+ years of proven experience as a software/system engineer.     Strong in OOPS, IPC, and data structures concepts.     Familiarity with application software development as well as embedded software development.     Experience in software development and coding in various languages (C, C++, C#).     Excellent knowledge of software and application design, architectural styles and design patterns, and architecture tradeoff analysis.     Proficient understanding of any one of the code versioning tools (Git, SVN, and Mercurial).     Familiarity with formal change control and support processes (JIRA, BitBucket, Scrum, etc.).     Understanding of VV approaches and software quality assurance principles.     Experience with service-oriented architecture (SOA), and cloud technologies would be an added, advantage.     Experience in mechatronics/robotics/avionics systems would be a big plus.     A technical mindset with great attention to detail, and innovation. Being passionate about making a difference.     Constant networking with thought leaders, analysts special interest groups. Actively listen to others and demonstrate understanding of other points of view.     Take the initiative to identify, work on problems proactively, and lead by example.     Consistently provide ideas, opinions, or information in a professional way.       Understand IP trademark policies and actively promote safe practices in projects.

column2: We are building a new tooling team at Boku      The goal for this team is to help Boku improve its operational efficiency by building tools and tooling platforms for other teams      Primary stakeholders for these tools and platforms will be engineering teams and secondary stakeholders will be few operational teams at Boku      As part of this role, you will be challenged to build end to end platform/libraries using which we will build future scalable applications at Boku      We are looking to onboard an engineering manager for this team who has experience experiencing in managing a team of engineers along with development experience in backend and frontend technologies      This position is going to be based in Mumbai      We are working in a hybrid environment with flexibility to work from home or office as and when needed      In the initial phase we expect manager to spend more time in office so that they familiarize more with the team and Boku s culture          About You          Hands-on technical leader experienced working with large scale systems      Self-starter - You require little to no supervision      Growth-minded - You are curious and enthusiastic to expand your skills      Ownership- Your team is your business. You are confident, driven, self-motivated and quickly take ownership of your work.      Product minded - You enjoy working with stakeholders on requirement discovery and building out new features      Multiplier - You are passionate about growing your team and building new leaders for Boku      People Management - You care about your engineers and their career progression. You want to ensure they have the right tools to do their job      Desire for impact - You are willing to take on more responsibilities as opportunities arise          RESPONSIBILTIES          Lead a small team of 3-5 engineers to include hiring, performance management, career development, etc      Provide technical guidance, mentorship, and assistance to the team to build tools to improve operational efficiency of various teams at Boku      Interface with other teams such as Project Management and Operations for requirement gathering and planning      Independently make technical and business decisions that lead to the successful execution and rollout of a project      Work hands-on with a highly skilled team of engineers      Participate in all phases of the software development lifecycle, including design, development, testing and release      Be highly motivated and maintain a positive, can-do attitude in a fast-moving environment      Foster the spirit of collaboration across multiple internal and external teams      Lead process improvement initiatives to improve Engineering as a whole          QUALIFICATIONS          Bachelor s degree in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent experience in related disciplines      10+ years of relevant experience in Software Engineering      Experience with managing or leading a team of engineers as a Technical Lead or Team Lead      Ability to work collaboratively and effectively with a range of stakeholders      Excellent written and verbal communication skills to document and explain technical design, best practices, and integration guide to both technical and non-technical audiences.      Strong software design and architecture skills      Experience building products that are hosted in the cloud (AWS, GCP, etc).      Experience with building UI based applications is added advantage      Experience with building service-oriented, database driven applications      Experience with some (or all) of the following technologies/frameworks/tools: Maven, Git, MySQL, Spring, JPA/Hibernate, Jersey, Jetty. ReactJS, AngularJS, Vue, etc.      Experience using agile methodologies and tools      Experience working on high-volume and low-latency systems      Attention to detail and strong organization skills

column2: About Element5 Element5 is on a mission to transform the way post-acute care organizations work. Using AI and RPA, we're automating complex and repetitive tasks, so teams can focus on better patient outcomes. In short, if post-acute teams are spending too much time on administrative work, Element5's digital assistants can take over for them. Were fast-paced, supercharged, and moving at the speed of light. Our team is made of industry veterans who have built several successful products for healthcare and IT, and are now on the most meaningful mission of our lives. Collectively, we impact improvements in care quality for millions of patients by freeing up healthcare teams from burdens of compliance and regulations. In 2022, Element5 raised $30 million in series B funding and operates with offices in San Jose, California, and Chennai, India. Element5 is looking for a Technical Manager who will be responsible for planning and overseeing support for overall delivery and execution of projects. You will be required to manage complex program goals for product performance, quality goals, regulatory compliance requirements, cost, schedule and development budget.  If you are seeking an organization whose values and actions support your growth and guide your daily actions, we want to work with you.   What's in it for you   Manage an innovative SAAS product instead of back office applications Not just manage, you can bring your own ideas to the table Take ownership of managing the delivery of a one-of-its-kind innovative product that is revolutionizing a niche segment in healthcare for a cutting edge Silicon Valley startup  Manage end-to-end projects implementing technologies such as Data Science, RPA, Cloud Engineering, etc Lead the project team to ensure solutions are reliable and of quality, in a highly collaborative fashion Closely contribute to an aggressively growing organizations scale, strategy, direction and growth. Mentor and evangelize Agile, Lean, and Continuous Delivery best practices Work in a transparent, collaborative culture that truly believes every idea has merit in it, and bring your best innovation, ideas forward. Work with a network of global teams and experienced leaders in healthcare  Collaborate with, mentor and inspire some of the industrys best and brightest. Element5s team is built of radical individuals with armoires of achievements.   What we ask to bring with you   Ability to manage the delivery using Agile methodology Experience with end-to-end delivery of product/project handling all stakeholders (customer, onsite coordinators, offshore team) A disruptive attitude towards technology innovation with ownership and accountability to drive result-based execution Enhanced curiosity. Always be thinking about newer ways to solve old problems and ways to adapt to the changing times Ability to play a techno-functional role and experience with, or knowledge of, Agile Delivery Methodology (Scrum and XP) Experience helping teams explore, adapt and optimize Agile-Lean processes, principles, and practices The ability to over communicate (along with excellent articulation skills) 3+ years of experience in managing software delivery projects 8+ years of overall experience
column11: Java Architecture, Technical Management, Project Engineering, Project Management, Technical Leadership

column2: Job Description   Cloud      Management: Monitor and manage cloud resources, ensuring optimal      performance and cost-efficiency. Collaboration:      Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, DevOps, and      security teams, to align cloud initiatives with organizational goals Stay      updated with emerging cloud technologies and recommend solutions for      continuous improvement. Project      Management: Manage the project from start to finish. Resource      Management: Handle the team's resources effectively. Risk      Management: Identify and address project risks and issues. Meeting      Facilitation: Lead project meetings and discussions Problem      Solving: Remove obstacles hindering the team's progress. Reporting:      Share project updates and issues with stakeholder and senior management Commitment      Setting: Help the team determine what they can accomplish. Coordination:      Ensure tasks are assigned and executed across teams Architectural      Support: Work with architects on architecture backlog management,      prototypes, and technical grooming Delegation:      Assign projects based on team members' strengths Planning:      Create detailed project plans Skill      Development: Develop leadership skills in the team. Estimation:      Make accurate project time estimates Code      Quality: Maintain high-quality code standards. Technology      Analysis: Stay updated on tech challenges and opportunities. Feasibility      Analysis: Assess project feasibility. Team      Building: Participate in hiring and onboarding activities. Conflict      Resolution: Resolve conflicts and promote problem-solving. Skill Set Good knowledge of one or      more cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, Good knowledge of      container technologies like Docker and container orchestration platforms      like Kubernetes Understanding and      experience with serverless computing models, such as AWS Lambda or Azure      Functions Strong understanding of      cloud security best practices Deep knowledge of C#,      ASP.NET, SQL Server and front-end frameworks Good understanding of      JavaScript frameworks like React or Angular Solid understanding of      computer architecture and server platform hardware Capable of building a      new team and mentoring team members Excellent verbal and      written communication skills Good Management Skills Strong communication,      leadership, and problem-solving skills Proven hands-on Software      Development experience. Proven working      experience in Microsoft technologies. Should have extensive      hands-on experience in designing and developing applications using C#,      ASP.NET and SQL Server Object Oriented analysis      and design using common design patterns. Knowledge of NoSQL would      be an added advantage. Must have led a team of      at least 10 engineers. Competency  Technical Proficiency Supervising Others Problem Solving Risk Management Interpersonal      communication Motivating others Communication Skills Manage Performance Organizing & Task      Management Building Effective Teams Developing Team and      Leaders Vision/planning Creativity/innovation Conflict resolution Delegation Honesty/Integrity Education  Computers, B.Tech, B.E, IT, Msc IT, MCA, MS, MSC Certification  Relevant cloud certifications from providers like Microsoft Azure and AWS. If interested please share your resume to purvesh.jani@advantmed.com

column1: Opening For Cloud Embedded Software Engineering Manager For Gurugram
column2: JOB SUMMARY:   The Cloud Software engineering manager must be a hands-on leader that   can contribute technically in conjunction while leading the staff and   coordinating new product development projects. These new projects encompass Cloud   and Embedded solutions. Key decision-making abilities include performing   design tradeoff analysis between software product requirements and schedule.   This position encompasses both research and prototyping of applications for   potential new products as wells as medical product development using a formal   quality system. ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS:     Essential Job Functions   Manage        and grow a software development team that can effectively deliver software        features. Follow        an agile-like software development process as well as conduct and manage        outside development resources (when required). Drive continuous        improvement of processes to efficiently design, develop, verify, and        sustain products to improve time to market. Empower,        coach, and mentor software development engineers using situational        leadership skills to grow their skills and performance. Provide        technical project management and leadership for every aspect of        software. Prepare        lifecycle for different projects inclusive of research, development,        design, evaluation, testing along with delivery to product management. Collaborate        with the software leader and the other software managers to continuously        improve the Cloud software architecture and its integration with the        embedded device software. Establish        and stimulate software development standards and processes along with        best practices for delivery of scalable and high-quality software. Supervise        resource allocation to assure attainment of apt business and personnel        development goals while ensuring the highest quality in designs. Participate        in planning exercises to accomplish technical as well as business needs        as related to the Business strategic plan. Evaluate        software projects and execute them from beginning to finish. Perform        annual written performance assessment of engineering personnel.   MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:   Knowledge/Experience    4-year Bachelor of Computer Science or equivalent advanced degree. Experience programming in a complex distributed client-server software   solution. 10+ years of software development experience. In-depth understanding of the micro-services architecture. Extensive experience in Python, Javascript/Typescript and web services. Experience in Kubernetes and Docker. Experience in embedded application development for the MS Windows or Linux   platform. Demonstrated experience of leading software projects. Knowledge of ISO 13485, ISO 14971 and IEC 62304 standards are a plus. Proven mastery of software engineering best practices including   estimation, design, testing from the unit level to the system level,   configuration management, change control and issue tracking. Experience with project tracking software with the ability to drive in   an Agile fashion, preferably with the Atlassian Tool Chain (Confluence, JIRA,   etc.). Good written and oral communication skills. Excellent organizational and time management skills. Able to lift 25lbs with or without accommodations. Skills/Abilities ??   Excellent   written and oral communication skills. Able   to provide either leadership or a supportive role within a project team. Able   to coordinate and manage multiple tasks simultaneously. Ability to   lift a minimum of 25lbs with or without accommodations.

column2: As the Senior Software Engineering Manager at Alt Mobility , you will lead our engineering team and drive the development of cutting-edge EV solutions while leveraging your expertise in data analytics. Your expertise and leadership will play a critical role in driving innovation and success to revolutionise the EV industry. You will be a key leader responsible for overseeing product development, and ensuring the successful execution of our engineering projects. You will play a pivotal role in shaping the technical direction of the company and fostering a culture of excellence within the engineering team.              Responsibilities:                 Technical Leadership:                 Provide visionary leadership and technical expertise with hands on coding, to guide the development and enhancement of our EV products and solutions.     Collaborate with the executive team to align engineering initiatives with the companys strategic goals and objectives.                 Engineering Team Management:                 Lead and mentor a talented team of engineers, fostering a collaborative and high-performance culture.     Set clear goals and performance expectations, conduct regular performance evaluations, and provide constructive feedback to nurture individual and team growth.                 Product Development:                 Oversee the end-to-end product development lifecycle, from concept ideation to commercialization.     Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product management, design, and operations, to ensure seamless integration of engineering efforts.                 Innovation and R&D:                 Drive continuous innovation and research efforts to stay at the forefront of EV technology trends and emerging industry standards.     Evaluate new technologies, materials, and methodologies to improve product performance and enhance the user experience.                 Quality and Compliance:                 Establish and enforce stringent quality standards and best practices throughout the engineering process to deliver products that exceed customer expectations.     Ensure compliance with relevant safety, environmental, and regulatory standards in all engineering activities.                 Project Management:                 Develop and implement robust project management practices to ensure on-time delivery of engineering projects within budgetary constraints.     Anticipate potential project risks and develop mitigation strategies to minimise disruptions.                 Collaboration and Stakeholder Management:                 Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to understand customer needs and translate them into engineering solutions.     Build strong relationships with suppliers, partners, and external stakeholders to leverage resources and foster collaborative innovation.                 Budgeting and Resource Allocation:                 Develop engineering budgets and allocate resources efficiently to optimise productivity and cost-effectiveness.     Monitor expenses and ensure adherence to the allocated budget while delivering high-quality results                 Talent Acquisition and Development:                 Participate in the recruitment process to attract top engineering talent to the organisation.     Provide opportunities for continuous learning and professional development to enhance the skills and expertise of the engineering team.               Qualifications:               Bachelors or Masters degree in Engineering (CS, IT or related field).      Proven experience (8+ years) in a senior engineering leadership role      Demonstrated ability to lead and inspire cross-functional engineering teams to deliver high-quality products on time in a 0-1 stage      Exceptional project management skills with a track record of successful project delivery.     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to collaborate effectively with internal and external stakeholders.     Demonstrated strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities.     Understanding of STEM      Experience in handling Telemetry devices would be preferred                Must have Technical Expertise:                Handling Big Data - Analytics and management      Experience in API - Pubsub platforms      Experience in handling Telemetry devices would be preferred      Cloud Platforms: AWS or Google Cloud Platform (GCP):      Embedded Systems and IoT      Kafka : For handling real-time data streams from EV sensors and IoT devices.      Minimum 5 years of experience in any backend technologies like Java/ Node.JS      Very good in Algorithms, Data structures, and Time Complexities      Minimum 5 years of frontend web development experience with Next/React/ Angular      Machine Learning and AI      Very Good Database Knowledge (PostgreSQL, Redis, etc)      Hands-on with Design, Coding, Debugging and Testing      Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills      Must have OOPS and Design patterns.      Good knowledge of data pipelines.      Deep understanding of Agile operating models (such as Scrum, Kanban, Scrumban, etc.) and Devops practices      CI/CD tools like Jenkins or GitLab CI      Awareness of cybersecurity best practices, encryption methods, and secure coding practices for EV systems.      Willingness to learn and experiment with new technology.

column1: FTC - Assistant Manager - Global Security Engineering
column2: The Global Security Engineering (GSE) team within the CPS function, are dedicated, responsible and accountable to provide the technical support to the corporate security systems across FIL and its associated businesses globally to meet the objective of delivering the most trustworthy, efficient, and sustainable physical security systems.      The core security systems that GSE are responsible for designing, deployment, and maintaining include Access Control, Digital Video Surveillance, Intruder Detection, ANPR, Automatic Gunshot and Lockdown System, Radio Systems, Digital Intercom, PSIM, Electronic Key Cabinets, etc.      Our vision is to be the most reliable, meticulous, and trusted service provider to our business. We appreciate the feedbacks and always endeavour to act on opportunities to improve the services we delivery.      The Assistant Manager GSE is responsible to effectively manage day to day GSE operational activities - project management, security system design & specification, system maintenance, working closely with various internal and external stakeholders including construction project management team, architect, procurement, data protection and compliance, cyber security team, security vendors, general contractors, and clients to ensure timely and accurate delivery of services across all the FIL offices globally.      Assistant Manager GSE must be an experienced team player, possess strong interpersonal skills, forward planner & strategic thinker, possess strong problem solving and decision-making skills, commercial awareness, agile, should have the ability to manage demanding workload while managing multiple projects running in parallel across geographic regions.      This position will be based out of our office at Gurugram, India and directly report into the Senior Manager Global Security Engineering based out in the UK.              Key Responsibilities              To plan, develop, implement, and manage a comprehensive and efficient combined security engineering programme for the operation security team.      Undertake regular reviews of existing installations to ensure that they conform to current standards and make suitable recommendations as required.      Proactive planning and project management for security installation at new or renovation site.      To develop and maintain a life cycle register for security systems and undertake regular reviews of existing security installations to ensure that they conform to current standards and make suitable recommendations for upgrade or replacement as appropriate.      Ensure the security system design and installation comply with local site-specific regulatory requirements and company policy.      To build and maintain cross functional relationships and to provide an effective interface with the Security Management Team.      Be able to conduct appropriate security risk assessments for all new offices and submit a suitable report identifying the physical risks and suggest appropriate solutions to meet the corporate standard and bring the identified risk to residual level.      Be responsible for ensuring that the annual maintenance schedule is performed at the appropriate time.      Be able to conduct research new products or applications and continuously endeavour to improve the efficiency and maturity of the overall physical security systems that would be of benefit to the security department and company in general.      Planning, organising, and undertaking security projects throughout the project lifecycle, within agreed timescales, budget, and without compromising the quality.      To assist in the preparation of the annual budget for both capital expenditures and operational expense related to Security Engineering team.      Continuously seek feedback and act on opportunities to implement a creative solution to a problem, scale, automate and simplify to optimise the benefits.      Be able to develop a comprehensive security tender package comprising of scope of work, security layout, vendor instruction, bill of material, and other essential tender documents for the appointment of security vendor.              Experience and Qualifications Required              6+ years of experience in a similar role and environment. In depth technical understanding of key security applications including but not limited to enterprise access control systems, digital video surveillance, intruder alarm systems, and ANPR, PSIM.      Have physical security operational experience and understand how the security systems demonstrate and integrated security functions and enhances the overall physical security solution.      To be able to work on tasks independently as well as within a team environment.      Strong interpersonal and communication skills with the ability to communicate effectively at all levels and maintain professional under stressful situations.      Good organisational skills, with emphasis on multi-tasking and rapidly assessing shifting priorities.      Be able to travel when required to other FIL offices in India and globally in both planned and unplanned scenarios-sometime at short notice in the event of a DR situation occurring.      Confident and skilled in preparing and delivering presentations and briefing to customers and numerous stakeholders.                      Desirable skills              B.Tech or equivalent degree qualification required.      Advanced Certificates in Security Engineering, Access Control System (Lenel) and CCTV (ExacqVision) system is highly desirable.      Extensive experience in a similar role providing Security Engineering, Project Management, Research and Development (security products) etc. gained within a financial services organisation or within a leading Corporate.      Proficient in using the Microsoft Office products for business- Excel, Word, Power Point, Power BI, and SQL.      Proven experience of delivering projects within a customer service focused environment.      PSP certifications are highly desirable.

Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively across cross-functional teams.         Strong problem-solving abilities and a commitment to delivering innovative and customer-centric solutions.
